name: Daily Portfolio Report
prompt: Generate daily portfolio report. Use botcore CLI to: 1) `botcore get_paper_portfolio` for balance and PnL. 2) `botcore get_paper_trades_history '{{"limit":10}}'` for today's trades. 3) `botcore get_paper_trades_open` for open positions. 4) `botcore get_paper_performance` for stats. Format as: portfolio balance, daily PnL ($, %), win rate, trade list (symbol, side, PnL), open positions table. Highlight big wins/losses. End with brief assessment. IMPORTANT: After generating the report, you MUST send it to Telegram using `botcore send_telegram_notification '{{"message":"<your formatted report here>"}}'`. Do NOT skip this step.
